Transformation Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch by specifying the euler angles and translation vector obtained from the coordinate system. Extrusion Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction with an extrusion depth of 0.0041 (towards the normal direction) and 0 (opposite the normal direction). This results in the creation of a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The height of the prism is 0.0041, the length is 0.75, and the width is also 0.75. There is no need to add or remove material from preceding CAD models in this step, as this is the first part. Therefore, the appropriate extrusion operation should be chosen based on this.</description>
